ModMetaData.name: Combat Bionics
ModMetaData.author: Freefolk
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds several bionic body parts with combat focused abilities. Swarm rockets, jump pack spines, you name it! Includes conditional patches for various Vanilla Weapons Expanded modules, doubling the content for the full set.
Utilizes Multi Verb Combat Framework (included in VE Framework) and Reloading by legodude17. Requires Vanilla Expanded Framework.
